org.apache.solr.handler.clustering.carrot2

Class CarrotParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.handler.clustering.carrot2.CarrotParams

  • public final class CarrotParams
extends Object
    Carrot2 parameter mapping (recognized and mapped if passed via Solr configuration).
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
